_DummyAttack.NAME: Attack
_DummyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy intends to attack.

_DummyNotAttack.NAME: Not Attack
_DummyNotAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy does not intend to attack.

ThinkAhead.NAME: Think Ahead
ThinkAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki. NL Discipline: Increase your Ki limit by 2. NL Ethereal NL Exhaust
ThinkAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki. NL Discipline: Increase your Ki limit by 2. NL Exhaust

MentalFortitude.NAME: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.DESCRIPTION: This turn, take no damage from self-inflicted sources.

AdaptiveCombat.NAME: Adaptive Combat
AdaptiveCombat.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Ki

Psychokinesis.NAME: Psychokinesis
Psychokinesis.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain Ki equal to any remaining energy.

TigerClaw.NAME: Tiger Claw
TigerClaw.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( !M! ) NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Ki.

BearClaw.NAME: Bear Claw
BearClaw.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( !M! ) NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

BoloPunch.NAME: Bolo Punch
BoloPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Ki x Vulnerable

ThumbStrike.NAME: Thumb Strike
ThumbStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Ki x Weak

Cooldown.NAME: Cooldown
Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust

CripplingBlow.NAME: Crippling Blow
CripplingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Ki. NL Discipline: Apply !M! Weak.

PlannedAttack.NAME: Planned Attack
PlannedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 cards from your discard pile and add them to the top of your draw pile

RoundhouseKick.NAME: Roundhouse Kick
RoundhouseKick.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Discipline: Heal 4 HP.

Reposition.NAME: Reposition
Reposition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Ki. NL Discipline: Gain !M! Ki

EmpoweredStrikes.NAME: Empowered Strikes

Restoration.NAME: Restoration
Restoration.DESCRIPTION: Convert your Ki to Regen. NL Exhaust

FinalRush.NAME: Final Rush
FinalRush.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( 1 ): NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain 3 Ki.

TakeABreather.NAME: Take A Breather
TakeABreather.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Ki. NL Discipline: Gain 3 Block.

UnrelentingStrike.NAME: Unrelenting Strike
UnrelentingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain Ki x energy. NL Does not consume your Ki. NL Exhaust

HammerBlow.NAME: Hammer Blow
HammerBlow.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( 1 ): NL Deal !D! Damage Ki times.

Brickbreaker.NAME: Brickbreaker
Brickbreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Lose 4 HP. NL Discipline: Deal !D! damage.

AlignSelf.NAME: Align Self
AlignSelf.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Ki. NL Gain X Buffer. NL Exhaust
AlignSelf.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Ki. NL Gain X+1 Buffer NL Exhaust

Mantra.NAME: Mantra
Mantra.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each excess Ki you generate.

ResourcefulThinking.NAME: Resourceful Thinking
ResourcefulThinking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Ki, draw !M! card.

Transcendence.NAME: Transcendence
Transcendence.DESCRIPTION: Gain Ki x energy. NL Draw Ki x card(s). NL Exhaust

MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Discipline: Gain !M! energy.

AllIn.NAME: All In
AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( !M! ) NL Lose 10 HP. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Discipline: Heal 5 HP

InnerFire.NAME: Inner Fire

Grapple.NAME: Grapple
Grapple.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 2 Ki.

OpportunityAttack.NAME: Opportunity Attack
OpportunityAttack.DESCRIPTION: Discipline: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ethereal.

Masochist.NAME: Masochist
Masochist.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain 1 Ki.

ShadowFist.NAME: Shadow Grasp
ShadowFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 damage for each Ki gained this combat. NL ( !D! ).

KiBlade.NAME: Ki Blade
KiBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Permanently increase this card's damage by Ki. NL Exhaust

Overextend.NAME: Overextend
Overextend.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( !M! ) NL Gain 3 energy, draw 2 cards.

LotusKick.NAME: Lotus Kick
LotusKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage Ki times to all enemies. NL Discipline: Do not consume your Ki. NL Exhaust

SurgingBlow.NAME: Surging Blow
SurgingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( 2 ) NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Ki. NL Heal !M! HP.

Backhand.NAME: Backhand
Backhand.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Discipline: Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

ElbowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Discpline: Prep ( 1 ) NL Repeat.
ElbowStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Prep ( 1 ) NL Repeat.

RapidResponse.NAME: Rapid Response
RapidResponse.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( 1 ) NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable.

ShadowRestore.NAME: Shadow Restore
ShadowRestore.DESCRIPTION: Heal 1 HP for each Ki gained this combat NL ( !M! ). NL Exhaust

ShadowBlock.NAME: Shadow Block
ShadowBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Block for each Ki gained this combat NL ( !B! ).

AllOrNothing.NAME: All Or Nothing
AllOrNothing.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Ki gained this combat. NL Deal 50 damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust

KickUp.NAME: Kick Up
KickUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 2 Ki. NL Exhaust

PsycheUp.NAME: Psyche Up
PsycheUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove all stacks of Preparation.

Kiai.NAME: Kiai
Kiai.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust

SpiritBarrier.NAME: Spirit Barrier
SpiritBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Ki gained this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

ClotWounds.NAME: Clot Wounds
ClotWounds.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, heal !M! HP.

BraceForImpact.NAME: Brace For Impact
BraceForImpact.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 3 Ki. NL Discipline: NL Preparation ( !M! ) NL Gain !B! Block.

DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( !M! ) NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Discipline: Gain 2 Ki.

PushThrough.NAME: Push Through
PushThrough.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive attack damage, gain !M! Block next turn.

ChannelSpirit.NAME: Channel Spirit
ChannelSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Preparation ( !M! ): NL Choose a card, reduce its cost by 5 this turn.

Atonement.NAME: Atonement
Atonement.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. NL Gain !M! Ki. NL Draw 1 Card.
